title: The Holy ShiteGeist 11/15: Kheira Hamraoui, Alex Jones, Kyle Rittenhouse, Beto O'Rourke, Elon Musk, Jake Gyllenhaal
itunes:title: The Holy ShiteGeist 11/15: Kheira Hamraoui, Alex Jones, Kyle Rittenhouse, Beto O'Rourke, Elon Musk, Jake Gyllenhaal
description:
In this edition of The Holy ShiteGeist, Jack and Miles discuss the Kheira Hamraoui attack case, Alex Jones being guilty in all four Sandy Hook defamation cases, the Kyle Rittenhouse trial, Beto O'Rourke running for Texas governor, Elon Musk forgetting that Bernie Sanders is still alive, and the Taylor Swift/Jake Gyllenhaal "All Too Well" situation

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
